title: BOC wants to add secret notes to a contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN I open a contract [in any state]
custom_expected:
THEN I can view and edit a field called BOC notes on the contract
AND Club cannot see or edit this field

title: BOC wants to be alerted on the clipboard if contract has Custom Language
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as BOC Admin
custom_steps: IF there is a MN contract in the clipboard that has an Add B clause with a custom language
custom_expected: THEN this row will appear with a C icon in the approvals clipboard

title: BOC wants to accept terms on a contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
custom_steps:
WHen I open a terms submitted contract (clipboard or player history)
AND I click on Terms accepted button
custom_expected:
THEN the contract state updates to terms accepted
AND status header changes to green and accepted with terms accepted under
ANd status changed by fields update
AND blue success notification appears
AND contract stays on approvals clipboard with new status

title: As a club, I want my player added to the roster when his contract reaches terms accepted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND this contract is not a successor contract
custom_steps: WHEN my players contract reaches status of terms accepted
custom_expected:
THEN player header will show updated roster status, club and LOP (Pending Active)
AND system updates players logo
AND player appears on MN league roster for target team (is included in roster counts)
AND players name and info appears in green on the roster

title: As BOC I want to delete a contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND I am viewing a preliminary or terms submitted contract
custom_steps:
WHEN I click delete button
AND Click yes on the warning message (Are you sure you want to delete this contract Y/N)
custom_expected:
THEN contract is no longer viewable in contract history
AND a blue success notif appears
AND all associated attachments are deleted
AND user is taken back to wherever close butto would take them

title: BOC wants to view errors around Addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC changes contract state from
- Preliminary > Terms Submitted
- Terms Submitted > Terms Accepted
custom_expected: THEN all of the rule checks listed in story [#117824991](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/118041703), Test Case [C114533](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/114533) must be run as **over-rideable** errors for BOC

title: BOC wants to see Contract attachments on clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into as BOC
AND User has created a contract with an attachment
AND Pushed contract to pending approval
custom_steps:
WHEN User goes to Approvals clipboard
AND Checks attachment column
AND Clicks attachment icon
custom_expected:
THEN attachment icon appears on clipboard
AND Attachment opens attached contract PDF

title: As club I want to be warned when submitting if later than 2 days from terms agreement date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into club account
AND selected a free agent
AND Goes to Contract Tab
AND User Creates a new minor contract
custom_steps:
WHEN User sets terms agreed upon date to 3 days prior than current date
AND fills out all required fields
AND Clicks Submit Terms
custom_expected: THEN User should get warning that Date submitted is later than 2 days from Terms Agreed Upon Date

title: As club I want to be warned if i submit terms later than 2 days from date signed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into club account
AND selected a free agent
AND Goes to Contract Tab
AND User Creates a new minor contract
custom_steps:
WHEN User sets Date Signed by Player 3 days prior to current date
AND Fills out all required fields
AND Clicks Submit Terms
custom_expected: THEN User should get warning that Date Signed by Player is 2 Days Later than Date Signed by Player

title: As Club I want be warned if signing this player is result in exceeding roster limits
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into club account
AND selected a free agent
AND Goes to Contract Tab
AND User Creates a new minor contract
custom_steps:
WHEN User Clicks Club
AND Selects a club who would be past their Active/Under Control Limits
AND Fills out all required fields
AND Clicks Submit Terms
custom_expected: THEN User gets a warning that lists that the Player will surpass the current limits

title: Club wants to be warned/stopped if Addendum C rule salaries are not correct
custom_steps: WHEN club submits a contract
custom_expected:
THEN run the following rule checks

- From [#104008698](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/projects/1402858/stories/104008698):

> [19.2](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/65831)
> [19.7](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/65833)
> [19.19](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/65835&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=9859)


- From [#104008814](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/projects/1402858/stories/104008814):

> [19.11](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/65490)


- From [#106044746](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/projects/1402858/stories/106044746):

> [19.12](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/65849)
> [19.13](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/65850)

title: As club I want to be stopped if my release date is before March 15
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into club account
AND selected a free agent
AND Goes to Contract Tab
AND User Creates a new minor contract
AND Checks Last day of Major League Season in System Admin
custom_steps:
WHEN User expands addendum B 
AND Selects Release Clause
AND Sets Roster Type Requirement Date not between March 15th and Last Day Major Lg. Season
AND Fufills all other required fields
AND Clicks Submit Terms
custom_expected: THEN Hard error appears that says "Release Date cannot be before 3/15. Please Contact BOC."

title: As club I want to be stopped if I submit a contract for next year before post season is over
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into club account
AND selected a free agent
AND Goes to Contract Tab
AND User Creates a new minor contract
AND User sets signing club post-season end date to after current date
custom_steps:
WHEN User sets beginning in year to next year
AND fufills all required fields
AND clicks submit terms
OR
WHEN Sucessor contract = Yes
AND User sets beginning in year to next year
AND fufills all required fields
AND clicks submit terms
custom_expected:
THEN hard error appears says "Non First year players may not sign a new contract for next year until this year's minor league season and post season are over."
OR 
THEN  Warning error appears that says  "Non First year players may not sign a new contract for next year until this year's minor league season and post season are over."

title: Clubs want to be stopped from submitting a contract if the Signing Date is later than post-season for a contract this year
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into club account
AND selected a free agent
AND Goes to Contract Tab
AND User Creates a new minor contract
AND User sets signing club post-season end date to after current date
custom_steps:
WHEN User sets Beginning in year to current year
AND Sets Signing date after Post Season End Date
AND Fufills all other required fields
AND Clicks Submit Terms
custom_expected: THEN Hard error appears that says " The Signing Date must be on or before the season ends on [date as entered in system dates table] "

title: Clubs want to be stopped from submitting a contract if Signing Date is oo the same year of or year before the contract start year
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into club account
AND selected a free agent
AND Goes to Contract Tab
AND User Creates a new minor contract
custom_steps:
WHEN User sets Signing Date to 3 years prior to contract Start year
AND Clicks Submit Terms
custom_expected: THEN User gets a hard error that says "The Signing year must be the same or previous year to the contract start year"

title: As BOC, I want to see Contract attachments on my clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that club has submitted a non-first year contract
AND added an attachment with the label "Contract"
custom_steps: WHEN BOC views the Approvals clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN the entry for the contract from preconditions will show an attachment
AND the attachment icon opens the attached pdf

title: As club I want to attach the signed contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club has submitted a contract
custom_expected:
THEN user can attach a file to the contract using the attached files section
AND the user can add the labels 'Contract' or 'Miscellaneous'
AND the table header "Label" has a required asterisk

title: As club I want to be stopped if my contract is not PDF
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club is viewing a submitted non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user attaches a non-pdf file
AND labels it "contract"
AND clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a hard error:
**Body** Attached Files - The file "Contract" is the wrong format
**Hint** Please upload a .pdf

title: As club I want to be stopped if more than 1 file is labeled contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that club is viewing a non-first year contract that is submitted
AND the contract has an attached pdf labelled "Contract"
custom_steps:
WHEN club adds another attachment
AND labels it "Contract"
AND clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN show hard error:
"Only one file attachment may have the label 'Contract'"

title: As club I want to be stopped if files are not correcly labeled on Add Cs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that club has tendered an Add C
AND is viewing that Add C as a single form
custom_steps:
1. WHEN club adds an attachment
AND does not apply a label
AND clicks save

2. WHEN club adds multiple attachments
AND does not apply labels
AND clicks save
custom_expected:
1. THEN show hard error:
"Attached Files - Label is a required field"
AND outline the missing label field in red

2. THEN show the above hard error
AND show it once even if multiple rows are missing labels
AND outline all missing label fields in red

title: As club I want to be stopped if files are not correctly labeled on contracts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that club has submitted a non-first year minor contract
AND is viewing that Add C as a single form
custom_steps:
1. WHEN club adds an attachment
AND does not apply a label
AND clicks save

2. WHEN club adds multiple attachments
AND does not apply labels
AND clicks save
custom_expected:
1. THEN show hard error:
"Attached Files - Label is a required field"
AND outline the missing label field in red

2. THEN show the above hard error
AND show it once even if multiple rows are missing labels
AND outline all missing label fields in red

title: As BOC I want to return a terms submitted to a club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
And I am viewing a contract that is terms submitted
custom_steps: WHEN I click on 'return to club' option
custom_expected:
THEN the contract is moved back to PRELIM
AND a blue success notif shows that contract has been moved back to preliminary
AND Contract history shows contract in red
AND contract falls off approvals clipboard
AND status header is updated

title: As club I want a ntoification if my terms submitted was returned to prelim
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND I have moved a contract back to preliminary
custom_steps:
WHEN I login as club the contract was returned to
AND I view my notifications widget
custom_expected:
THEN I see a notification (that can be deleted)
Type = Minor Contracts
Populate Org column (3 letter abbreviation only) and Player column (Roster name)
Description = Minor League Contract was returned to Preliminary

title: As BOC I want terms submitted contracts to appear on my clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a club
AND have submitted a contract to terms submitted
custom_steps:
WHEN I login as the BOC
AND view my approvals clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN I can see that the contract shows up with the Date, From, Name, Position, Type, Level, Status and Comments columns populated
AND type should show as non first year contract

title: As club I want to edit information in terms submitted state
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a club
AND have located a contract that is terms submitted
custom_steps:
WHEN I click EDIT and can only edit these fields
[Player's street address and city, state, zip fields in Player summary section
- Location Signed fields in Execution of Contract section
- Signatory and Negotiator fields in Execution of Contract section
- The club comments field
custom_expected:
THEN I am able to save these changes
AND I cannot add or remove clauses/addendums
AND required field checks are run on save

title: As club I want to see other clubs contracts terms accepted or higher
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN I search for another clubs contract that is Terms Accepted (or higher)
custom_expected:
THEN I am able to view other clubs contracts with this state
AND these contracts are in green font in contract history
AND only close button is available

title: As club I want to filter notifications
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am loggd in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN I view the notifications widget
custom_expected:
THEN I can see that seconds has been removed from timestamp
AND Club can filter by Type (multiselect)
AND BOC can filter by ORG (single select)

title: As club I want to be stopped if date range has a from date before to date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a club
AND I am on a players contract
custom_steps:
WHEN I enter a date range for Foreign team Inquiry and Release clause
AND IF the From date is not before the To Date
AND I try to submit
custom_expected: THEN I should see hard error "For [Clause name], the From Date must be before the To Date"

title: As club I do not want to see Add F/G for MJ players
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the system date for 'begin to create new mnc for following year' is a date into the future
AND I am logged in as BOC
AND I am viewing a player who already has an active MJC for this year
custom_steps: WHEN I open a new MNC for this player
custom_expected:
THEN the sections Add G and F will not be available
AND I cannot add them from 'add sections'

title: As club I want to see a history of contracts in player history
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as Club
AND I have located a player who has a contract with status of Terms Accepted
custom_steps: WHEN I view the player history
custom_expected:
THEN I can see that there is an entry in player history in green font
Date = Player's signing date
Code = Min Cont
Desc = Signed a Minor League Contract for [Number of Seasons] years. Signing Bonus: [Signing bonus value as shown in his Contract History].

title: As club I want to be stopped if my signing bonus dates are before contract signing date
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club is viewing a preliminary contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user toggles the Signing Bonus clause on
AND enters multiple rows with Payment Dates before the contract's Signing Date
AND clicks submit
custom_expected:
THEN user sees a hard error:
"The Signing bonus payment date cannot occur before the contract Signing Date"
AND the error only shows once

title: As club I want to be stopped from entering more than 1 roster bonus per LOP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that club is viewing a preliminary contract
AND has toggled the Opening Day Roster Bonus and Remain on Roster Bonus clause on
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects the same Level of Play drop-down selection in either drop-down
AND clicks submit
custom_expected:
THEN user sees hard error:
"The same level of play cannot be entered more than once for [Addendum B clause name]"

title: As club I want be to be stopped if signing bonus pmts. are not paid by conclusion of next year
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club is viewing a preliminary contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user sets a Signing Bonus Payment Date after the conclusion of the next calendar year from the contract's Signing Date
AND clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN show hard error:
"The Signing Bonus payment date cannot occur after the end of the next calendar year"

title: As club I want be stopped from creating a contract for next season if player is alrdy covered by mnc
custom_preconds:
1. GIVEN that club is viewing the contract history of a player with a contract covering him this year and next

2. GIVEN that club is viewing the contract history of a player with a contract covering him this year and next

3. GIVEN that club is viewing the contract history of a player with a NO contract covering him for this year or next
custom_steps:
1. WHEN it is before the system date "Minor contracts can be created for next year"
AND user creates a new contract

2. WHEN it is after the above system date

2. WHEN user creates a new contract
custom_expected:
1. THEN show hard error "This player already has an outstanding Minor League Contract for the requested year"

2. THEN show hard error "This player already has an outstanding Minor League Contract for the requested year"

3. THEN the contract creation is allowed
AND when the user clicks submit, the above rule checks are run again

title: As club I want to be stopped if the incorrect recoupment language for Signing Bonus
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club is viewing a preliminary contract with the Signing Bonus or Signing Bonus with Visa Contingency clause toggled on
custom_steps:
1. WHEN user sets the signing bonus amount between 0-250,000
AND the Recoupment language exceeds 3 years

2. WHEN user sets the signing bonus amount between 250,001-1,000,000
AND the Recoupment language exceeds 4 years

3. WHEN user sets the signing bonus as 1,000,001+
AND the Recoupment language exceeds 5 years

AND user clicks Submit
custom_expected: THEN show hard error "The Signing bonus amount is only eligible for a [3/4] year recoupment but you have selected the [4/5] year recoupment language"

title: As club I want to be stopped from entering invalid amount range in Foreign Inquiry Clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club is viewing a preliminary contract with a Foreign Inquiry clause
custom_steps:
WHEN 'Between' is selected
AND the Acquisition From amount is greater than the To Amount
AND the user clicks Submit
custom_expected: THEN show hard error: "For the Foreign Team Inquiry clause, the Acquisition From Amount must be less than the To Amount"

title: As club I want to be stopped from Adding Add F/G to MJ league players
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club is viewing a preliminary contract for a player that has an MJ contract covering the same year
custom_steps:
WHEN the user adds and F or G
AND the user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN show hard error:
**Body:** Addendums F and/or G on this contract are invalid because this player has a Major League contract for that year.
**Hint:**Please remove the Addendums F and/or G to continue.

title: As club I want to be warned if my XXB FA qualified for Retention Bonus
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that club is viewing a preliminary contract for a player whose last approved transaction was "Declare Free Agent XXB"
AND it occurred this year or the year prior to the contract year
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected: THEN show hard error: "Player is a XXB Free Agent and qualifies for Retention Bonus"

title: As club I want to be warned if my contract has MJ terms but missing MN assignment salaries
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that club is viewing a preliminary contract
AND that contract contains one or more Addendum B - Major League Terms
AND does not include the Minor League Assignment salary clause
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN show warning:
**Body:** The contract that you are about to submit contains Major League terms but does not contain a Minor League Assignment Salary.  
**Hint:** Pursuant to Attachment 24 of the Basic Agreement, without including a Minor League Assignment Salary in this contract you may not be able to include a "split" salary in the Major League contract if you later select this player to the Major League roster

title: Clubs want to print the Boiler Plate language on contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in view or edit mode on a player's contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'print' to the left of edit/save buttons
custom_expected: THEN pdf will populate in new tab

title: Club Spanish-speaking players want to see boiler plate language translated to Spanish
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has selected 'Spanish' in the language field on a player's contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'Print'
custom_expected:
THEN PDF should generate in a new tab translated into Spanish
AND translation should follow the English version

title: Club can print Addendum A of contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills out an Addendum A
AND user clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum A should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND all behavior listed in the Report Details should be met
AND the layout follows the template
AND fields not yet filled out should print blank

title: Club can print Addendum B of contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks print clicks 'print'

1. WHEN user fills out multiple Addendum Bs
AND clicks 'print
custom_expected:
THEN Add B should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND it should show the header and footer and follow the template

1. THEN add a page break after the footer "No Other Provisions"

title: Club can print Addendum B - Minor League Terms
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user toggles Minor League Terms to Yes
AND clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Add B - Minor League Terms should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank

title: Club can print Addendum B - Termination Pay Clauses
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user toggles Termination Pay to Yes
AND clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Add B - Termination Pay should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank

title: Club can print Addendum B - Major League Terms
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user toggles Major League Terms to Yes
AND clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Add B - Major League Terms should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank

title: Club can print Addendum C of contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum C should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank
AND Add C prints on its own page
AND fits on one page

title: Club can print Addendums E, F, G, H
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters an Addendum E, F, G, and H
AND clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum E, F, G, and H should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank

title: Club can print Life Insurance section
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters a Life Insurance section
AND clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Life Insurance Consent should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank

title: Club can have page numbering
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN the contract should have page number starting at page 1 as shown in the [sample](https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347185?projectId=14044)
AND Addendums C, E, F and G should each be one page
AND start on their own page
AND other addendums should begin on the same page unless less then 1/4 of the page is remainng
